item.title: Analyst: Cyclical Indicator Shows Bitcoin is in the Late Bull Market Stage
item.description: On August 24th, CryptoQuant analyst Axel Adler Jr. posted, indicating that "This week, Bitcoin fluctuated within a narrow range between $111,000 and $117,000, with a 90-day return of +5%, suggesting that the market is in a consolidation phase."Spot ETF Fund Flow (7 days): There was a net outflow of 2,400 BTC; the 7-day average trading volume is 545,000 BTC per day, alleviating the distribution pressure.In terms of the macro environment, the Federal Reserve hinted at the possibility of a rate cut. The declining yields provided support to the market, but it was still restricted by tariff and cost risks. The Index Market Phase cyclical indicator shows that Bitcoin is in the late bull market phase."

item.title: BIO Surges Above $0.3, Up Over 36% in 24 Hours
item.description: On August 24th, based on HTX market data, BIO has surpassed $0.3 and is currently priced at $0.3099, with an increase of more than 36% in the past 24 hours.

item.title: Bio Protocol Founder: Over the past few weeks, the protocol has received over $4 million in liquidity fees and is currently integrating with a DeFi protocol to launch the BIO lending market.
item.description: On August 24th, Paul Kohlhaas, the founder of Bio Protocol, tweeted, "Bio Protocol has achieved revenues exceeding $4 million in the past few weeks through liquidity fees. While the majority view BIO as a 'DeSci launchpad,' the team is also tasked with managing all BioDAO liquidity pools and optimizing the protocol's proprietary liquidity (POL) and assets under management (AUM). Presently, Bio Protocol is engaged in collaborating on integrations with top DeFi protocols, with the launch of a lending market for BIO."

item.title: Bitcoin Dominance Falls to 58.23%, Reaches New Low Since January
item.description: On August 24th, based on market data, the Bitcoin dominance (BTC.D) has seen a 2.35% decrease over the past week and currently stands at 58.23%, reaching a new low since January of this year.During the same period, the total crypto market capitalization has increased by 0.24% in the past week. The total market capitalization excluding Bitcoin (TOTAL 2) has risen by 3.69%, and the total market capitalization excluding Bitcoin and Ethereum (TOTAL 3) has increased by 1.48%.

item.title: Binance Wallet Bonding Curve Edition TGE Launches OVERTAKE (TAKE)
item.description: August 24th, as per official channels, Binance Wallet exclusively rolled out the Bonding Curve version TGE of OVERTAKE (TAKE).· Subscription Period: 4:00 to 6:00 PM on August 25, 2025 (Coordinated Universal Time + 8);· Subscription Qualification: Eligible users must participate by using Binance Alpha Points;· TGE specifics and the event page will be made available shortly.

item.title: Total WLFI Contract Position Across All Exchanges Surpasses $200 Million, Marking a 782.37% Increase in the Last 24 Hours
item.description: On August 24th, based on Coinglass data, the current total WLFI contract position across the network amounts to $208 million, showing a 24-hour increase of 782.37%. The contract trading volume is $1.948 billion, with a 24-hour growth of 1996.07%. The 24-hour aggregated long/short ratio is 0.9508.In the past 24 hours, the total WLFI liquidation across the network reached $7.0679 million, including $5.3464 million in long liquidations and $1.7215 million in short liquidations.

item.title: 「Big Brother」 Huang Licheng Goes Long with 10x Leverage on HYPE, Current Position Worth $4.41 Million in HYPE Long Position
item.description: On August 24th, according to the monitoring of HyperInsight (accessible via https://app.hyperliquid.xyz/join/NTOD), "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng has, in the past 2 hours, gone long on HYPE with a 10x leverage, holding 100,000 coins (approximately $4.41 million), with an average entry price of $43.9 and currently having an unrealized profit of $20,000.In addition, "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng also holds a long position of 15,500 ETH ($74.06 million), with an average entry price of $4,637.75 and currently having an unrealized profit of $2.18 million.

item.title: Shitcoin Season Index Drops to 46
item.description: On August 24th, according to the data from Coinmarketcap, the Altcoin Season Index declined to 46 (lower than 50 from yesterday). This index indicates that within the past 90 days, approximately 46 projects among the top 100 cryptocurrencies in terms of market capitalization have achieved a higher price increase compared to Bitcoin.Note: The CMC Altcoin Season Index is a real-time indicator employed to determine whether the current cryptocurrency market is in an altcoin-dominant season. This index is based on the performance of the top 100 altcoins relative to Bitcoin over the past 90 days.

item.title: LookOnChain: Binance Alpha Launches FST
item.description: August 24th. Binance Alpha has launched FST.

item.title: CITIC Securities: The Trading Logic of a "Powell Put"-Driven Rally Will Lead the Next U.S. Stock Market
item.description: On August 24th, the research report of CICC Securities holds the view that Powell's speech at the Jackson Hole Symposium was in line with our previous anticipations. It is predicted that the Federal Reserve will reduce interest rates three times this year, with each reduction being 25 basis points. On the asset side, we believe that the main theme of the "interest rate cut trade" in the U.S. stock market will be redefined, and the "catch-up" trading logic will play a dominant role in the future U.S. stock market. Similar to the "interest rate cut trade" in July 2024, where asset classes sensitive to interest rates such as the Russell 2000, S&P 500 Real Estate, and NASDAQ Biotechnology witnessed a rise in prices, this situation may occur again.The market's expectation of the Fed's interest rate cuts this year still differs from our perspective. We anticipate that U.S. bond yields and the U.S. dollar index have a slight downward potential. For non-U.S. equities, Powell's dovish remarks
